snippet: The coast guard had sought to impound a Chinese fishing boat it said was illegally fishing in South Korean waters, officials said.
abstract: Captain of a Chinese fishing boat is killed when South Korean Coast Guard fires shots as officers tried to impound vessel they say was illegally fishing in South Korean waters; official says captain appeared to be struck when an officer fired warning shots from a pistol during a violent clash between South Korean officers who boarded the ship and the crews of the boat and four other vessels that joined in the fight.

byline.contributor: Jane Perlez contributed reporting from Beijing.

lead_paragraph: The coast guard had sought to impound a Chinese fishing boat it said was illegally fishing in South Korean waters, officials said.

headline.main: Fisherman From China Dies in Clash Off S. Korea
headline.print_headline: Fisherman From China Dies in Clash Off S. Korea
